Add-ons for etcd
================

This package provides utility for using [etcd][].

Features
--------

* Functions for etcd client config.

Usage
-----

Read [the documentation][godoc].

License
-------

etcdutil is licensed under MIT license.

[etcd]: https://coreos.com/etcd/
